name: Intel CET: Active
description: Control enforcement technology is available on new Intel platforms and prevents exploits from hijacking the control-flow transfer instructions for both forward-edge (indirect call/jmp) and back-edge transfer (ret).
failure-impact: A local or physical attacker with an existing unrelated vulnerability can use a ROP gadget to run arbitrary code.

failure-results.not-supported: CET not being used by the host
